altername_name: Même les pommes de terre ont des yeux!
name: Meme les Pommes de Terre Ont des Yeux!
overview: Meme les Pommes de Terre Ont des Yeux is a text adventure game released by Froggy Software in 1985 for Apple II . The game is characterized by a tone of humor (black in particular). Like almost all Froggy games, the illustration of the jacket is signed by Jean Solé .
